summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6213 for the improvement of Warsaw Street from 44th Ave. South to Rainier Ave.; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88545, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
